subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:music
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
----------MB_8CCD08177FDC8FB_24DC_12BD2_Webmail-m116.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

 Hi Sharon for SF, Yes, for a few minutes, i think it was, Andrea Bocelli's=
, Lord's Prayer, Aerosmith's,=C2=A0 I don't want to miss a thing, Above All=
, as sung by this little girl, Kaitlyn Maher, Air Supply's, Makin love out =
of nothing at all, Anne Shelton, I'll Be seeing you, they seem to like thes=
e type of songs, I know, sounds silly, but i do get compliments from the ot=
her side, it's probably hard standing in that line for days on end waiting =
to get in, i was told by someone over there, that after the Resurrection sp=
. they will take them all in at once, then the door gets shut for the 1000 =
years, after that is a finial judgement, and things get really ruff, His pe=
rsonality changes.. to do this thing.=C2=A0 Evil itself is going to be dest=
royed, how, I have no idea.=C2=A0 It may be that evil is a condition of the=
 mind, since energy is neither created nor destroyed. sf

 



-----Origina=
l Message-----
From: leongbabe@...
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: We=
d, Jun 2, 2010 10:48 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re:music

          =C2=A0      =
                             Very clear indeed; thanks, Snowfire.=C2=A0 (BT=
W, after hearing that, did you play some music?;)
   =C2=A0
   Sharon from =
SF
 
 
   
  
      
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CCD08177FDC8FB_24DC_12BD2_Webmail-m116.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"


<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Hi Shar=
on for SF, Yes, for a few minutes, i think it was, Andrea Bocelli's, Lord's=
 Prayer, Aerosmith's,  I don't want to miss a thing, Above All, as sun=
g by this little girl, Kaitlyn Maher, Air Supply's, Makin love out of nothi=
ng at all, Anne Shelton, I'll Be seeing you, they seem to like these type o=
f songs, I know, sounds silly, but i do get compliments from the other side=
, it's probably hard standing in that line for days on end waiting to get i=
n, i was told by someone over there, that after the Resurrection sp. they w=
ill take them all in at once, then the door gets shut for the 1000 years, a=
fter that is a finial judgement, and things get really ruff, His personalit=
y changes.. to do this thing.  Evil itself is going to be destroyed, h=
ow, I have no idea.  It may be that evil is a condition of the mind, s=
ince energy is neither created nor destroyed. sf<br>
</div>

<div> <br>
</d=
iv>

<div><br>
</div>
